attributes.action: Current Year 10 students should be have formula sheets in science
attributes.additional_details: We believe the government should make it that the companies creating gcse papers for the current Year 10's should include formula sheets as the foundation of their secondary education has been effected by the pandemic. Formula sheets will help students to do well considering the impact on their education.
attributes.background: Current Year 10 students missed most of Year 7 due isolation and covid in general. And again in Year 8 missed many chunks of the school year. Therefore they should receive formula sheets as vital chunks of their education has been missed.

rejection.details: Ensure GCSE students have support materials for maths and science exams in 2025: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651803
